summary: This is an email from July 10, 2019, discussing the need for assistance from C20 (likely an FBI or law enforcement unit) to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence the following day for digital media and computer equipment. Most of the unit is in Florida interviewing victims.

events.title: Planned search of Epstein's Manhattan residence
events.description: C20 (law enforcement unit) plans to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

events.title: Coordination for search warrant assistance
events.description: Email sent to coordinate assistance for the planned search warrant execution at Epstein's residence, as most of C20 is in Florida interviewing victims.

keyFacts: A search warrant was planned for July 11, 2019, at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence.
The search targeted digital media and computer equipment.
Most of the C20 law enforcement unit was in Florida interviewing victims at the time, requiring additional assistance for the New York operation.
The email demonstrates active investigation into Epstein in July 2019, shortly before his arrest and death.
